text: @d_rafi1 As a mate said, if there was a Pick Fruit & Veg For The NHS Facebook group or hashtag, there would be competitive fruit and veg picking and no need to fly folks into a Coronavirus hotspot to get their hands dirty on our behalf. #CoronaCrisisuk
